nodes.text: The Senex sector, also known simply as the Senex, was a sector in the galaxy, located near the Juvex sector within galaxy's Mid Rim. Q'anah's Marauders, a pirate group led by Q'anah, a pirate queen and folk hero in the Senex, was famous for its bold crusades across the Senex-Juvex. Tikiar starfighters were produced in the Senex sector, though they were often seen elsewhere throughout the galaxy, even in the Outer Rim.
